content.name: open_incidents
content.viewOptions:
{
  "headerOptions": {
    "layout": "inline",
    "showPriority": true,
    "showSeverity": true,
    "showPatientType": false,
    "showLocation": true,
    "showCreator": true,
    "showSeverityChange": true,
    "showOpenDuration": true,
    "showClosedTime": true,
    "showCurrentUserResponse": false,
    "allowSeverityChange": false,
    "allowClose": "test-only"
  },
  "showRespondents": true,
  "respondentOrderBy": "as_supplied",
  "respondentOrderByReverse": false,
  "respondentStatusFilter": "all",
  "showRespondentOnlineStatus": true,
  "showRespondentCurrentOnCallStatus": true,
  "allowFlagArrived": false,
  "allowFlagStandIn": false
}

content.name: closed_incidents
content.noIncidentsMessage: No incidents closed in the last 24 hours

content.name: content_message
content.content:
Welcome to Trauma Reporting.

Please wait while we automatically authenticate you...

content.name: support_info_detail
content.content:
Support Area

App Version: {{'$store.schema.version' | store}}

Server: {{'$store.preferences.xmppUrl' | store}}

AD Login SPN: {{'$store.preferences.adLoginSpn' | store}}

content.name: additional_info
content.content:
User Info

Role: {{'$store.variables.userRole' | store}}

App Info

Internal Build: {{'$store.variables.internalBuildVersion' | store}}

App Identifier: {{'$store.preferences.appIdentifier' | store}}

XMPP Domain: {{'$store.preferences.xmppDomain' | store}}

XMPP Room: {{'$store.preferences.xmppRoom' | store}}

XMPP Bot Jid: {{'$store.preferences.xmppBotJid' | store}}

XMPP Bot Timeout: {{'$store.preferences.xmppBotTimeout' | store}}

XMPP Ping Interval: {{'$store.preferences.xmppPingInterval' | store}}

XMPP Ping Timeout: {{'$store.preferences.xmppPingTimeout' | store}}

XMPP MUC Host: {{'$store.preferences.xmppMucHost' | store}}

XMPP Max Message Age: {{'$store.preferences.xmppMaxMessageAge' | store}}

Incident Expiration: {{'$store.preferences.incidentExpiration' | store}}

content.name: footer_message
content.content: Belfast Health and Social Care Trust - Copyright {{'$store.variables.currentYear' | store}} v{{'$store.schema.version' | store}}

content.name: report_type_message
content.content: What type of report would you like to create?

content.name: report_type

options.label: Total Incidents By Category and Type

content.message: You must select the type of report

content.name: date_range_message
content.content: What date range would you like to report on?

validators.name: must_be_before_to
validators.message: The "from" date is after the "to" date

validators.name: most_be_after_from
validators.message: The "to" date is before the "from" date

content.name: report_list
content.noReportsMessage: No reports have been created in the last 24 hours

data.code:
cti.debugLog(":: Going to manual login page")

$success($data)

css_fonts
app_css
css_footer
css_reports

changes.name: Downgrade
changes.label: Downgraded
changes.confirmationMessage: You are about to downgrade this incident. Is this correct?

changes.name: Upgrade
changes.label: Upgraded
changes.confirmationMessage: You are about to upgrade this incident. Is this correct?

predefinedIncidents.confirmationMessage: You are about to test the system, is this correct?

labels.LABEL_NO_CONNECTIVITY:
The system is offline and trying to reconnect.

If this issue persists you should revert to the manual process for raising this incident.
labels.LABEL_ERROR_LOGGING_IN_MESSAGE: Check your connectivity and credentials and try again.
labels.LABEL_CONFIRM_KICK_USER_MESSAGE:
Someone is logged into ${role}.

Do you want to make them Off-duty?
labels.LABEL_USER_KICKED_MESSAGE: ${newUser} has logged on with this Role. You have been logged off.
labels.LABEL_CONFIRM_RAISE_INCIDENT: You are about to raise a new ${severity} ${priority} Path incident. Please seek acceptance before confirming!
labels.LABEL_CONFIRM_CLOSE_INCIDENT: You are about to close this incident. Is this correct?

data.code:
cti.debugLog(":: INCIDENT SEVERITY CHANGED", { previousIncident: $data.oldIncident, newIncident: $data.newIncident });
$success($data);
